alert.note: Alert for Apache (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 9:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Chinle in Apache County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Chinle Wash is ongoing and structures are flooded. With warmer weather forecast this weekend, additional snowmelt is likely to keep flows in Chinle Wash elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1008 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chinle and Canyon De Chelly National Monument. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Keep children away from culverts, creeks and washes! Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away. Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event.
